item.title: Dan testing some RMarkdown
item.description: A Quick Test Throughout, we will assume that there are measurements of clinical state, obtained by some instrument, usually with some noise added. Further, for the purposes of this post, we assume that there is some latent process being measured by these instruments and we use clinical symptoms as a concrete example (but the principles generalise to anything that can be measured and taken to represent state). For pedagogical reasons, the easiest example is to consider just two dimensions - for example, in psychosis, we might measure the positive and negative symptom burden.
